import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add user as ticket follower"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/followers/user/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds a user as a follower to a ticket. The user will receive email and in-app notifications about ticket updates, allowing them to stay informed without being directly assigned.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **userId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/search/global-search) or [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) to find the user and extract `Item.Users[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → extract `TicketId`
2. Find user: [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/search/global-search) with user name → extract `UserId`
3. Add follower: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/user/\{userId\}](/docs/api/tickets/add-ticket-follower-user)
4. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-followers) to confirm addition

**Use Cases**: Keeping managers informed, adding subject matter experts for visibility, notifying stakeholders of progress.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-followers) – List current followers
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/user/\{userId\}](/docs/api/tickets/remove-ticket-follower-user) – Remove follower
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/team/\{teamId\}](/docs/api/tickets/add-ticket-follower-team) – Add team as followers

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"userId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the user to add as follower","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
